class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Enrollment is restricted to History PhD students that took HIST 790A in the fall.


This continuation of the HIST 790 sequence provides a formal setting where students can acquire skills necessary for careers both inside and outside the academy. Focusing on the professional world of the historian in a variety of settings and career paths, this course sequence is designed to provide guidance for advanced students as they prepare to enter the job market.
sections: Class Nbr: 2844, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 12-2p, Instructor: J. Ward, Status: Open
